header.title: Sales are coming soon!!!ðŸŽ¯
header.subtitleHtml: Don't miss out on these limited time offers.

html: <bob-panel id='content'>
@slot:header-content
<tooldrawer-cluster label='Timer mode'>

<tooldrawer-field-content-timer-mode group-label='' type='choice-tiles' size='md' path='timer.mode' label='Select timer type' value='{{timer.mode}}' options='[{"label":"Date","value":"date","icon":"calendar"},{"label":"Countdown","value":"personal","icon":"person"},{"label":"Counter","value":"number","icon":"plus"}]' />
</tooldrawer-cluster>
<tooldrawer-cluster label='Time unit labels'>
<tooldrawer-field-content-timer-labels group-label='' type='textfield' size='md' path='timer.labels.days' label='Days label' value='{{timer.labels.days}}' />
<tooldrawer-field-content-timer-labels group-label='' type='textfield' size='md' path='timer.labels.hours' label='Hours label' value='{{timer.labels.hours}}' />
<tooldrawer-field-content-timer-labels group-label='' type='textfield' size='md' path='timer.labels.minutes' label='Minutes label' value='{{timer.labels.minutes}}' />
<tooldrawer-field-content-timer-labels group-label='' type='textfield' size='md' path='timer.labels.seconds' label='Seconds label' value='{{timer.labels.seconds}}' />
</tooldrawer-cluster>
<tooldrawer-cluster label='Date settings' show-if="timer.mode == 'date'">
<tooldrawer-field-timer-date group-label='' type='datepicker' size='md' path='timer.targetDate' label='Target date & time' value='{{timer.targetDate}}' placeholder='2026-01-20T12:00' />
<tooldrawer-field-timer-date group-label='' type='textfield' size='md' path='timer.timezone' label='Timezone (IANA or browser)' value='{{timer.timezone}}' placeholder='browser' />
</tooldrawer-cluster>
<tooldrawer-cluster label='Countdown settings' show-if="timer.mode == 'personal'">
<tooldrawer-field-timer-personal group-label='' type='valuefield' size='md' path='timer.timeAmount' label='Time amount' value='{{timer.timeAmount}}' />

<tooldrawer-field-timer-personal group-label='' type='dropdown-actions' size='md' path='timer.timeUnit' label='Time unit' value='{{timer.timeUnit}}' options='[{"label":"Hours","value":"hours"},{"label":"Minutes","value":"minutes"},{"label":"Days","value":"days"},{"label":"Weeks","value":"weeks"},{"label":"Months","value":"months"}]' />

<tooldrawer-field-timer-personal group-label='' type='dropdown-actions' size='md' path='timer.repeat' label='Repeat' value='{{timer.repeat}}' options='[{"label":"Never","value":"never"},{"label":"1 minute","value":"1 minute"},{"label":"5 minutes","value":"5 minutes"},{"label":"1 hour","value":"1 hour"},{"label":"1 day","value":"1 day"},{"label":"1 week","value":"1 week"}]' />
</tooldrawer-cluster>
<tooldrawer-cluster label='Counter settings' show-if="timer.mode == 'number'">
<tooldrawer-field-timer-number group-label='' type='valuefield' size='md' path='timer.targetNumber' label='Target number' value='{{timer.targetNumber}}' />
<tooldrawer-field-timer-number group-label='' type='valuefield' size='md' path='timer.startingNumber' label='Starting number' value='{{timer.startingNumber}}' />
<tooldrawer-field-timer-number group-label='' type='valuefield' size='md' path='timer.countDuration' label='Count duration (seconds)' value='{{timer.countDuration}}' />
</tooldrawer-cluster>
<tooldrawer-cluster label='Actions - During countdown'>
<tooldrawer-field-actions-during group-label='' type='textfield' size='md' path='actions.during.url' label='Button URL' value='{{actions.during.url}}' placeholder='https://example.com' />
<tooldrawer-field-actions-during group-label='' type='textfield' size='md' path='actions.during.text' label='Button text' value='{{actions.during.text}}' />

<tooldrawer-field-actions-during group-label='' type='dropdown-actions' size='md' path='actions.during.style' label='Button style' value='{{actions.during.style}}' options='[{"label":"Primary","value":"primary"},{"label":"Secondary","value":"secondary"}]' />
<tooldrawer-field-actions-during group-label='' type='toggle' size='md' path='actions.during.newTab' label='Open in new tab' />
</tooldrawer-cluster>
<tooldrawer-cluster label='Actions - After countdown'>

<tooldrawer-field-actions-after group-label='' type='dropdown-actions' size='md' path='actions.after.type' label='After timer ends' value='{{actions.after.type}}' options='[{"label":"Hide timer","value":"hide"},{"label":"Link","value":"link"}]' />

<tooldrawer-field-actions-after group-label='' type='textfield' size='md' path='actions.after.url' label='URL' value='{{actions.after.url}}' show-if="actions.after.type == 'link'" placeholder='https://example.com' />
<tooldrawer-field-actions-after group-label='' type='textfield' size='md' path='actions.after.text' label='Link text' value='{{actions.after.text}}' show-if="actions.after.type == 'link'" />
</tooldrawer-cluster>
</bob-panel>
<bob-panel id='layout'>
<tooldrawer-cluster label='Placement'>

<tooldrawer-field-layout-position group-label='' type='choice-tiles' size='md' path='layout.position' label='Widget position' value='{{layout.position}}' options='[{"label":"Inline","value":"inline","icon":"line.3.horizontal.decrease.circle"}]' />
</tooldrawer-cluster>
@slot:header-layout
@slot:stagepod-layout
</bob-panel>
<bob-panel id='appearance'>
<tooldrawer-cluster label='Timer text'>

<tooldrawer-field-appearance-theme group-label='' type='dropdown-actions' size='md' path='appearance.timerStyle' label='Timer style' value='{{appearance.timerStyle}}' options='[{"label":"Separated","value":"separated"},{"label":"Inline","value":"inline"}]' />

<tooldrawer-field-appearance-theme group-label='' type='dropdown-actions' size='md' path='appearance.timeFormat' label='Time format' value='{{appearance.timeFormat}}' options='[{"label":"Auto","value":"auto"},{"label":"Days, Hours, Minutes, Seconds","value":"D:H:M:S"},{"label":"Hours, Minutes, Seconds","value":"H:M:S"}]' />
<tooldrawer-field-appearance-theme group-label='' type='toggle' size='md' path='appearance.showLabels' label='Show unit labels' default='true' />
<tooldrawer-field-appearance-theme group-label='' type='dropdown-actions' size='md' path='appearance.theme' label='Theme' value='{{appearance.theme}}' />

<tooldrawer-field-appearance-theme group-label='' type='dropdown-actions' size='md' path='appearance.animation' label='Animation' value='{{appearance.animation}}' options='[{"label":"Fade","value":"fade"}]' />
<tooldrawer-field-appearance-settings group-label='' type='dropdown-fill' size='md' fill-modes='color' path='appearance.textColor' label='Text color' value='{{appearance.textColor}}' />

<tooldrawer-field-appearance-settings group-label='' type='dropdown-actions' size='md' path='appearance.separator' label='Separator' value='{{appearance.separator}}' options='[{"label":"Colon","value":":"},{"label":"Slash","value":"/"},{"label":"Dash","value":"-"}]' />
</tooldrawer-cluster>
@slot:header-appearance
<tooldrawer-cluster label='Timer background' show-if="appearance.timerStyle == 'separated'">

<tooldrawer-field-appearance-item group-label='' type='dropdown-fill' size='md' fill-modes='color,gradient' path='appearance.itemBackground' label='Timer tile background' value='{{appearance.itemBackground}}' />

<tooldrawer-field-appearance-item group-label='' type='toggle' size='md' path='appearance.cardwrapper.radiusLinked' label='Link timer tile corners' value='{{appearance.cardwrapper.radiusLinked}}' default='true' />

<tooldrawer-field-appearance-item group-label='' type='dropdown-actions' size='md' path='appearance.cardwrapper.radius' label='Corner radius' placeholder='Choose radius' value='{{appearance.cardwrapper.radius}}' show-if="appearance.cardwrapper.radiusLinked == true" options='[{"label":"None","value":"none"},{"label":"Small","value":"2xl"},{"label":"Medium","value":"4xl"},{"label":"Large","value":"6xl"},{"label":"X-Large","value":"10xl"}]' />

<tooldrawer-field-appearance-item group-label='' type='dropdown-actions' size='md' path='appearance.cardwrapper.radiusTL' label='Tile top-left radius' placeholder='Choose radius' value='{{appearance.cardwrapper.radiusTL}}' show-if="appearance.cardwrapper.radiusLinked == false" options='[{"label":"None","value":"none"},{"label":"Small","value":"2xl"},{"label":"Medium","value":"4xl"},{"label":"Large","value":"6xl"},{"label":"X-Large","value":"10xl"}]' />

<tooldrawer-field-appearance-item group-label='' type='dropdown-actions' size='md' path='appearance.cardwrapper.radiusTR' label='Tile top-right radius' placeholder='Choose radius' value='{{appearance.cardwrapper.radiusTR}}' show-if="appearance.cardwrapper.radiusLinked == false" options='[{"label":"None","value":"none"},{"label":"Small","value":"2xl"},{"label":"Medium","value":"4xl"},{"label":"Large","value":"6xl"},{"label":"X-Large","value":"10xl"}]' />

<tooldrawer-field-appearance-item group-label='' type='dropdown-actions' size='md' path='appearance.cardwrapper.radiusBR' label='Tile bottom-right radius' placeholder='Choose radius' value='{{appearance.cardwrapper.radiusBR}}' show-if="appearance.cardwrapper.radiusLinked == false" options='[{"label":"None","value":"none"},{"label":"Small","value":"2xl"},{"label":"Medium","value":"4xl"},{"label":"Large","value":"6xl"},{"label":"X-Large","value":"10xl"}]' />

<tooldrawer-field-appearance-item group-label='' type='dropdown-actions' size='md' path='appearance.cardwrapper.radiusBL' label='Tile bottom-left radius' placeholder='Choose radius' value='{{appearance.cardwrapper.radiusBL}}' show-if="appearance.cardwrapper.radiusLinked == false" options='[{"label":"None","value":"none"},{"label":"Small","value":"2xl"},{"label":"Medium","value":"4xl"},{"label":"Large","value":"6xl"},{"label":"X-Large","value":"10xl"}]' />
<tooldrawer-field-appearance-item group-label='' type='dropdown-border' size='md' path='appearance.cardwrapper.border' label='Timer tile border' value='{{appearance.cardwrapper.border}}' />
<tooldrawer-field-appearance-item group-label='' type='dropdown-shadow' size='md' path='appearance.cardwrapper.shadow' label='Timer tile outside shadow' value='{{appearance.cardwrapper.shadow}}' />
</tooldrawer-cluster>
<tooldrawer-cluster label='Stage/Pod'>

<tooldrawer-field-podstageappearance group-label='' type='dropdown-fill' size='md' fill-modes='color,gradient,image,video' path='stage.background' label='Stage background' value='{{stage.background}}' />
<tooldrawer-field-podstageappearance group-label='' type='dropdown-shadow' size='md' path='stage.shadow' label='Stage outside shadow' value='{{stage.shadow}}' />
<tooldrawer-field-podstageappearance group-label='' type='toggle' size='md' path='stage.insideShadow.linked' label='Link stage inside shadows' value='{{stage.insideShadow.linked}}' default='true' />

<tooldrawer-field-podstageappearance group-label='' type='dropdown-actions' size='md' path='stage.insideShadow.layer' label='Inside shadow layer' value='{{stage.insideShadow.layer}}' options='[{"label":"Show below content","value":"below-content"},{"label":"Show above content","value":"above-content"}]' />

<tooldrawer-field-podstageappearance group-label='' type='dropdown-shadow' size='md' path='stage.insideShadow.all' label='Stage inside shadow' value='{{stage.insideShadow.all}}' show-if="stage.insideShadow.linked == true" />

<tooldrawer-field-podstageappearance group-label='' type='dropdown-shadow' axis='y' size='md' path='stage.insideShadow.top' label='Stage inside shadow (top)' value='{{stage.insideShadow.top}}' show-if="stage.insideShadow.linked == false" />

<tooldrawer-field-podstageappearance group-label='' type='dropdown-shadow' axis='x' size='md' path='stage.insideShadow.right' label='Stage inside shadow (right)' value='{{stage.insideShadow.right}}' show-if="stage.insideShadow.linked == false" />

<tooldrawer-field-podstageappearance group-label='' type='dropdown-shadow' axis='y' size='md' path='stage.insideShadow.bottom' label='Stage inside shadow (bottom)' value='{{stage.insideShadow.bottom}}' show-if="stage.insideShadow.linked == false" />

<tooldrawer-field-podstageappearance group-label='' type='dropdown-shadow' axis='x' size='md' path='stage.insideShadow.left' label='Stage inside shadow (left)' value='{{stage.insideShadow.left}}' show-if="stage.insideShadow.linked == false" />
<tooldrawer-field-podstageappearance group-label='' type='dropdown-fill' size='md' fill-modes='color,gradient,image,video' path='pod.background' label='Pod background' value='{{pod.background}}' />
<tooldrawer-field-podstageappearance group-label='' type='dropdown-border' size='md' path='appearance.podBorder' label='Pod border' value='{{appearance.podBorder}}' />
<tooldrawer-field-podstageappearance group-label='' type='dropdown-shadow' size='md' path='pod.shadow' label='Pod outside shadow' value='{{pod.shadow}}' />
<tooldrawer-field-podstageappearance group-label='' type='toggle' size='md' path='pod.insideShadow.linked' label='Link pod inside shadows' value='{{pod.insideShadow.linked}}' default='true' />

<tooldrawer-field-podstageappearance group-label='' type='dropdown-actions' size='md' path='pod.insideShadow.layer' label='Inside shadow layer' value='{{pod.insideShadow.layer}}' options='[{"label":"Show below content","value":"below-content"},{"label":"Show above content","value":"above-content"}]' />

<tooldrawer-field-podstageappearance group-label='' type='dropdown-shadow' size='md' path='pod.insideShadow.all' label='Pod inside shadow' value='{{pod.insideShadow.all}}' show-if="pod.insideShadow.linked == true" />

<tooldrawer-field-podstageappearance group-label='' type='dropdown-shadow' axis='y' size='md' path='pod.insideShadow.top' label='Pod inside shadow (top)' value='{{pod.insideShadow.top}}' show-if="pod.insideShadow.linked == false" />

<tooldrawer-field-podstageappearance group-label='' type='dropdown-shadow' axis='x' size='md' path='pod.insideShadow.right' label='Pod inside shadow (right)' value='{{pod.insideShadow.right}}' show-if="pod.insideShadow.linked == false" />

<tooldrawer-field-podstageappearance group-label='' type='dropdown-shadow' axis='y' size='md' path='pod.insideShadow.bottom' label='Pod inside shadow (bottom)' value='{{pod.insideShadow.bottom}}' show-if="pod.insideShadow.linked == false" />

<tooldrawer-field-podstageappearance group-label='' type='dropdown-shadow' axis='x' size='md' path='pod.insideShadow.left' label='Pod inside shadow (left)' value='{{pod.insideShadow.left}}' show-if="pod.insideShadow.linked == false" />
@slot:stagepod-corners
</tooldrawer-cluster>
</bob-panel>
<bob-panel id='settings'>
<tooldrawer-cluster label='SEO/GEO'>
<tooldrawer-field-settings-seo-toggle group-label='' type='toggle' size='md' path='seoGeo.enabled' label='Enable SEO/GEO optimization' />
<tooldrawer-field-settings-seo group-label='' type='toggle' size='md' path='seo.enableSchema' label='Enable schema' show-if="seoGeo.enabled == true" />
<tooldrawer-field-settings-seo group-label='' type='textfield' size='lg' path='seo.canonicalUrl' label='Canonical URL' placeholder='https://example.com/page' show-if="seoGeo.enabled == true" />
<tooldrawer-field-settings-geo group-label='' type='toggle' size='md' path='geo.enableDeepLinks' label='Enable deep links' show-if="seoGeo.enabled == true" />
</tooldrawer-cluster>
<tooldrawer-cluster label='Clickeen Branding'>
<tooldrawer-field-behavior-settings group-label='' type='toggle' size='md' path='behavior.showBacklink' label='Show Made with Clickeen' />
</tooldrawer-cluster>
</bob-panel>
